content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **learn more about the harvest hues crochet along & collection and get signed up here ** 1 **create a cozy masterpiece the colorful granny stitch crochet blanket** *this pattern is included in the harvest hues collection* transform your yarn stash into a work of art with the colorful granny stitch crochet blanket this versatile and vibrant blanket pattern is perfect for crocheters looking to add a splash of color to their home decor while putting leftover yarn to good use **why you ll love this blanket ** * **perfect scrap buster ** have a collection of yarn remnants this blanket is the ideal project to use them up turning scraps into something beautiful and functional * **temperature blanket option ** looking for a year-long crochet journey this pattern can easily be adapted into a temperature blanket with each row representing the daily temperature creating a meaningful and unique keepsake * **classic granny stitch ** the timeless granny stitch makes this blanket a joy to crochet its repetitive meditative pattern allows you to unwind and relax as you watch your blanket grow * **burst of color ** whether you go for a planned color scheme or a more random approach the result is a blanket that s as bright and cheerful as it is cozy and warm * **versatile and customizable ** this pattern is designed to be as flexible as your imagination whether you want to create a large cozy throw or a smaller lap blanket the easy-to-follow instructions allow you to customize the size to fit your needs perfect for crocheters of all levels this pattern comes with detailed instructions including a full video tutorial to guide you through each step crochet hook i 5 5mm - or size to meet gauge 2 notions removable stitch marker 3 yarn needle to weave in ends 4 scissors 5 yarn lion brand color theory 6 100% acrylic 246yds/100g main color color a moonbeam alternate colors color b-rotating through colors raisin himalayan salt tourmaline peacock or lion brand pound of love 7 100% acrylic 1020 yds / 16oz caron blossom cakes 8 61% cotton 39% acrylic 481 yds/8 0z color b radiant rainbow yardage varies per size see chart in pattern yarn substitutions hobbii kind feather 9 100% premium acrylic 257 yds / 3 5oz lion brand mandala ombre 10 100% acrylic 344 yds/150g abbreviations blo - back loop only chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch es stsc - stacked single_crochet 11 gauge 14 sts x 8 row unblocked= 4x4 in granny stitch not sure what gauge is check out this blog post what is crochet gauge and how to fix it 12 sizes there are 17 size options in this pattern and it s easily customizable the size shown in the images is the stroller-size blanket skill level intermediate let s
